thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Novabay Pharmaceuticals Announces Preliminary Sales For Q4 And FY17

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Novabay Pharmaceuticals Announces Preliminary Sales For Q4 And FY17
text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Novabay Pharmaceuticals Inc:
* - PRELIMINARY Q4 TOTAL SALES EXPECTED TO SLIGHTLY EXCEED $6 MILLION, UP 49% OVER Q4 OF 2016
* NOVABAY PHARMACEUTICALS ANNOUNCES PRELIMINARY SALES FOR 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR
* SEES FY 2017 REVENUE ABOUT $18 MILLION * SEES FY 2017 SALES UP 51 PERCENT * FY2017 REVENUE VIEW $17.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $6.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
